20g PROTEIN
Meal Prep

MEAL PREP OAT AND HONEY PROTEIN BARS

Easy to make and perfect for meal prep, these oat and honey bars offer 20g of protein per serving.

20g
Protein
240
Calories
25m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bar

Carbs28g
Fat10g
Fiber4g
Sugar12g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 180g rolled oats
  • 120g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 120g almond butter
  • 80g honey
  • 60ml milk
  • 50g chopped nuts

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat oven and prepare pan

Preheat your oven to 175¬∞C (350¬∞F) and line an 8x8 inch pan with parchment paper.

2

Mix dry ingredients

In a large bowl, combine the rolled oats and protein powder.

3

Mix wet ingredients

In a separate bowl, whisk together the almond butter, honey, and milk.

4

Combine wet and dry

Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until well combined. Stir in the chopped nuts.

5

Bake

Press the mixture into the prepared pan and bake for 15 minutes.

6

Cool and cut

Let the bars cool completely before cutting into 12 bars.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
